page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT in NORTH HUISH
page.content: Little apart from local activities organised by the local groups such as the Womens Institute, but Plymouth boasts two{theatres,}Dartington has an amateur theatre, and Challaborough has a{sports complex. }All of these are within reasonable travelling distance for those with cars. The nearby coastline is spectacular and has many miles of easily walkable footpaths. Dartmoor is another source of natural enjoyment, but mainly people have to make their own entertainment, such as whist & beetle drives, barn-dances, etc. There is a group of{Campanologists } who travel the area giving recitals. Horseriding is also widely practised, with many local and provincial competitions.
